focus.$description: Focus style used when the component is focused (box-shadow).

focusInset.$description: Inset variant of the focus ring (box-shadow inset).

focusContrastMode.$description: Focus style used when Windows High Contrast (forced-colors) mode is active.

outline.$description: Outline style for focus ring when Windows High Contrast (forced-colors) mode is active.

offset.$description: Outline offset for focus ring when Windows High Contrast (forced-colors) mode is active..
